author: Esther Emma
content:
that's quite a range, andreas.
i picked some of them to comment numbering in your of 1-21 ;-)
there we go:
#4 i love the entangle snow tracks. it's like a puzzle out of my childhood. where did the container with red sticker come from ðŸ™‚
#7 water under the bridge. love the light and the view. could standing there for hours ðŸ™‚
#11 such a lovely rhythm and contrast. it's like a melody with water and ice streaming together (or something like that ;-))
#12 rhythm thsi time in changing textures. i would call that refined, subtle. and i do love it ðŸ™‚
and last but not least 
#18 it almost instantly reminds me of your image: The Harmony Of Industry And Nature II, that i've placed as my desktop at my workstation. i had to look three times to be sure, but i now know, i'm right ðŸ™‚
the same place, from just another angle. i think it's the same quality of light, somehow. ðŸ™‚

have a nice day, andreas ðŸ™‚
